articles.title: Enhancing Mobile Device Security: Applying the NIS2 Directive - MSSP Alert
articles.description: The European Union's Network and Information Systems Directive (NIS2) recommends mobile threat defense (MTD) solutions as vital tools to protect mobile devices.
articles.content: Mobile devices have become indispensable in our modern lives, enabling us to stay connected, access information, and conduct transactions on the go. However, the rise of mobile usage for accessing co… [+9058 chars]
